title: user_registration_with_valid_data
description: Test the /auth/signup endpoint to ensure a new user can register successfully with valid username, password, email, and name.

title: user_registration_with_missing_fields
description: Test the /auth/signup endpoint to verify proper error handling when required fields like username or password are missing.

title: user_login_with_correct_credentials
description: Test the /auth/login endpoint to confirm that a user can log in successfully with valid username and password.

title: user_login_with_incorrect_credentials
description: Test the /auth/login endpoint to verify that login fails with appropriate error message when incorrect username or password is provided.

title: get_servers_list
description: Test the GET /servers/ endpoint to ensure it returns the list of servers accessible to the authenticated user.

title: create_server_with_valid_data
description: Test the POST /servers/ endpoint to verify that a new server can be created successfully with valid server details.
